          <title>
            <string language="en">A transformer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Transformator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un transformateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um transformador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un trasformatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας μετασχηματιστής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un transformador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates a transformer whose primary coils is connected to a d.c. supply when the switch is closed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transformers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potential difference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">primary coils</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht einen 
Transformator dessen Primärspulen an ein Gleichstrom Zubehör 
angeschlossen wird, wenn der Schalter geschlossen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre un transformateur dont les 
enroulements primaires est reliés à un approvisionnement de C.C 
quand le commutateur est fermé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra um transformador cujas as 
bobinas preliminares estejam conectadas a uma fonte da C.C. quando o 
interruptor é closed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra un trasformatore di cui le 
bobine primarie è collegata ad un rifornimento di CC quando 
l'interruttore è chiuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί έναν μετασχηματιστή τα ο 
οποίος αρχικά πηνία συνδέονται με έναν ανεφοδιασμό συνεχούς 
ρεύματος όταν κλείνουν το διακόπτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra un transformador que bobinas
primarias estén conectadas con una fuente de la C.C. cuando el 
interruptor es cerrado.</string>
          </description>
